attributes.action: CHC funding and Primary Health Needs need to be defined and not just "concepts"
attributes.additional_details:
At the moment the process of CHC assesment is both confusing, stressful and unfair.  You need a primary health need to get funding - buit this is not defined it is a concept open to "interpretation"

Alzhiemer;s Dementia is currently NOT a primary health need and yet it is a progressive incurable terminal illness - no other disability is disregarded like this one.

Free acess to good health care is a fundamental right and this is a huge issue for alot of families at a very distressing time = please help us to get this process made fairer and less stressful to all who need them.
